an3.83:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, kassako gahapati patikacceva khettam sukattham karoti sumatikatam.
an3.83:1.4: Patikacceva khettam sukattham karitva sumatikatam kalena bijani patitthapeti.
an3.83:1.5: Kalena bijani patitthapetva samayena udakam abhinetipi apanetipi.
an3.83:1.6: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini kassakassa gahapatissa pubbe karaniyani.
an3.83:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, tinimani bhikkhussa pubbe karaniyani.
an3.83:2.4: imani kho, bhikkhave, tini bhikkhussa pubbe karaniyani.
an3.83:3.2: ‘tibbo no chando bhavissati adhisilasikkhasamadane, tibbo no chando bhavissati adhicittasikkhasamadane, tibbo no chando bhavissati adhipannasikkhasamadane’ti.
